content: built by function and feature classification to help you determine, by a quick scan, what is supported and the minimum operating system level that is required. End of service operating systems: Operating system levels that are no longer in service are not covered in this publication. Operating systems Supported Version and release on IBM z16a a. Service is required. z/OS V2R2b b. z/OS V2R2 - Toleration mode only. The IBM Software Support Services for z/OS V2R2 offered as October 1st, 2020, provides the ability for customers to purchase extended defect support service for z/OS V2.R2. z/VM V7R1 21st Century Software VSEn c c. VSEn is supported by 21st Century Software. V6R3 z/TPF V1R1 Linux on IBM Z d d. KVM hypervisor is supported by Linux distribution partners. See Table 7-2 on page 247 Chapter 7.
